content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment perfect for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I am on a tight budget. I am looking for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment, so I will have to furnish it myself. I was thinking of starting with an offer of 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 500 euros per month is a very generous offer, Emilia, but considering the prime location and the recent renovations, I was hoping for something closer to 800 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. The location is indeed central and the apartment is newly built. However, as a student, I have to consider my budget carefully. I am willing to go up to 600 euros per month, as it is the maximum I can afford.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Emilia. 600 euros per month is more in line with what I was hoping for. However, given the current housing market, I think I can let it go for 700 euros per month. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mister Schmidt. However, 700 euros is still not within my budget. I will have to furnish the apartment myself, which is why I need to keep the rent as low as possible. I am willing to pay 625 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, you are a shrewd negotiator. 625 euros per month is getting closer to what I can accept. I'll tell you what, since you seem like a responsible tenant, I'll let it go for 650 euros per month. This is my final offer. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your final offer, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 650 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be perfect for you, and I'm sure you'll enjoy the central location. We'll proceed with the paperwork, and I'll have the keys ready for you soon. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
